overview: Action-packed espionage thriller based on a book by Mickey Spillane. A man who has been framed for a large-scale robbery escapes from prison, but is caught and given a choice between returning behind bars and working for the CIA. He is enlisted to rescue a scientist from a dictator-run island, disguised as a drug dealer with another agent posing as his wife, while simultaneously plotting to prove his innocence.
tagline: Mickey Spillane. His Gut-Rupping! ... Face Splattering! ... Adventure Turns a Carribean Paradise Into a Bullet-Riddled Island of Hell!
title: The Delta Factor
